title: Croq'Nature
typeOfFood: Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Fusion
description: A vegetarian lunch place with vegan options. You can pre-order your take-away food preferably before 10:00 am. In addition to the original lunch daily menu, you can order salads, juices and bakery from the menu (which is on the website). Provides classes of master vegan, gluten free and raw cooking. You can rent one of the 2 places to hold your alternative classes like yoga, painting, laughter workshop and others. The owner offers the opportunity to include his cooking with your classes.
